(:action buy ; Obtain a resource and update its status
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (not (obtained ?item)) (not (knowledge ?item)))
    :effect (and (obtained ?item) (knowledge ?item))

(:action make ; Create or modify a resource and update knowledge
:parameters (?npc - agent ?resource - object ?location - place)
:precondition (and (obtained ?resource) (not (knowledge ?location)) (not (made ?resource)))
:effect (and (knowledge ?location) (made ?resource))
